metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15939 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenCV 4.1.0. There is a divide-by-zero error incv::HOGDescriptor::getDescriptorSize in modules/objdetect/src/hog.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm3
libopencv-contrib3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm3
